subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The project aims at capacity development of the National Assembly and its accountability mechanisms, enabling it to effectively fulfill its oversight role, being especially significant in the country's fight against corruption, which is one of the most crucial issues for the citizens of Serbia, according to the latest surveys. The current initiative is focused on supporting the institutionalization of public hearings, laying basis for effective collaboration between the Parliament and independent regulatory bodies and holding mobile committee sessions, which would contribute to enhancing the citizens' perception of the Parliament and to bringing the MPs closer to their constituency.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: PRLMT-Strengh. Accountability

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
